# delegate

**Instance Property**

The object you use to customize the toolbar contents and configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any NSToolbarDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Assign an object to this property if you customize the toolbar’s behavior. The object you assign to this property must adopt the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbarDelegate] protocol.

## Configuring the toolbar contents

- **NSToolbarDelegate**: A set of optional methods you use to configure the toolbar and respond to changes.
